ModMetaData.name: Chill the F*** Out
ModMetaData.author: Captain Muscles (Nathan Harbour)
ModMetaData.description:
Does your pawn need to take a break, but they just keep on working instead? If you don't enjoy having to juggle work assignments and schedules just to get a pawn to chill out for five g**damn minutes, then this mod is for you.
This mod adds the ability to command a colonist to engage in certain recreation activities (the ones that involve specific buildings).
